title: CreativeWork Schema
description: A JSON Schema for the CreativeWork credential that represents creative works using schema.org vocabulary.

id.description: The unique identifier for the creative work, typically a URI.

schema:name.description: The name or title of the creative work.

schema:description.description: A description of the creative work.

schema:url.description: The URL where the creative work can be accessed.

oneOf.description: The URI of the author of the creative work.

schema:author.description: The author of the creative work.

oneOf.description: The URI of the creator of the creative work.

schema:creator.description: The creator of the creative work.

schema:dateCreated.description: The date and time when the creative work was created.

schema:datePublished.description: The date and time when the creative work was published.

schema:dateModified.description: The date and time when the creative work was last modified.

schema:genre.description: The genre of the creative work.

schema:keywords.description: Keywords or tags associated with the creative work.

schema:license.description: The license under which the creative work is distributed.

oneOf.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

id.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

schema:name.description: The name of the copyright holder.

schema:copyrightHolder.description: The copyright holder of the creative work.

schema:inLanguage.description: The language of the creative work (ISO 639-1 code).

schema:isAccessibleForFree.description: Whether the creative work is accessible for free.

schema:fileFormat.description: The file format of the creative work.

schema:contentSize.description: The size of the creative work content.

schema:encodingFormat.description: The encoding format of the creative work.

schema:thumbnailUrl.description: The URL of a thumbnail image for the creative work.

schema:image.description: The URL of an image representing the creative work.

schema:isPartOf.description: The URI of a larger creative work of which this is a part.

schema:hasPart.description: Array of URIs of creative works that are parts of this work.

schema:citation.description: Citations or references used in the creative work.

schema:abstract.description: An abstract or summary of the creative work.

schema:wordCount.description: The number of words in the creative work.

schema:characterCount.description: The number of characters in the creative work.

schema:pageCount.description: The number of pages in the creative work.

schema:duration.description: The duration of the creative work (for time-based media).

schema:interactionType.description: The type of interaction being measured.

schema:interactionStatistic.description: Statistics about user interactions with the creative work.
